translations.text: Has the news of the Overwhelming Event reached you ˹O Prophet˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be downcast,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translation.text: They will be given to drink

translations.text: left to drink from a scalding spring.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ

translations.text: They will have no food except a foul, thorny shrub,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍ

translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: On that Day ˹other˺ faces will be glowing with bliss,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: where no idle talk will be heard.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: In it will be a running spring,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ

translations.text: Do they not ever reflect on camels—how they were ˹masterfully˺ created;<sup foot_note=77614>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the sky—how it was raised ˹high˺;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the mountains—how they were firmly set up;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the earth—how it was levelled out?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So, ˹continue to˺ remind ˹all, O  Prophet˺, for your duty is only to remind.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: You are not ˹there˺ to compel them ˹to believe˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But whoever turns away, persisting in disbelief,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: then Allah will inflict upon them the major punishment.<sup foot_note=77615>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Surely to Us is their return,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: then surely with Us is their reckoning.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
